flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=380>>380 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 380*0.1=$<<380*0.1=38>>38
So his purchase came out to 1400-38=$<<1400-38=1362>>1362
#### 1362

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 380. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
